storyInfo: For the past year, Ethan has been searching the world for a particular old acquaintance. He learns that the man he is looking for is in Lungmen.

attributes.content: Oh, here you are.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Sorry to keep you waiting, Madame Oni.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: When did you get here? Yesterday?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Yep... I came with the Messenger convoy.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Rhodes Island's Messengers told me you'd left last month? What took you so long?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Our convoy ran into a little trouble on the way. We came across a few Infected Creatures. We got lucky, though.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Well, I'm glad you got here in one piece.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: So you came all the way here just for this?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Here, this is who you're after.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: The tall policewoman hands a thick file to the short Savra.
Oh, thanks. Let's see here...
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Are you sure he's the one?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Definitely... no question.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Looks like we're not the first you've turned to for help. You also asked Lee's Detective Agency, right?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: So who he is?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: A really good friend.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Let me ask you again. Are you sure it's him?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: My answer's still the same, Officer Hoshiguma. I am pretty sure that's him.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: You still don't know how serious this is, don't you?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Do you know how much trouble this is going to be if he's actually the 'Kevin' you were talking about?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Right, I know, I know.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: *Sigh*, Old Ch'en sure knows how to ruin my day.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Rhodes Island's position in Lungmen is delicate, to say the least, and the one you're looking for there... Well, it's a long story.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: This case is technically being taken on by a civilian agency, but, well...
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: If things get out of hand, it's gonna be my head. You get that, right?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Yeah, I get it, Madame Oni.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: This is personal, though. Nothing to do with Rhodes Island. Relax.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Kam!
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Right here, Inspector Hoshiguma.
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: This is Officer Kam. He'll help you look.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: What's up, Officer Kam.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: (Nods)
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: Report back the instant something happens.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: Thanks for the help, Madame Oni.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Be careful, and don't go looking for trouble, especially not there. Don't stay too long.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Right, I get it.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Inspector Hoshiguma told me you work as an informant for Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: Yeah, I do.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Speaking of, how's Ch'en Sir doing?
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: Oh, don't worry about it if you can't tell me. I just figured I'd ask.
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: Um, I don't know Officer Ch'en that well...
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: But I guess she's been keeping busy helping everybody out. Seems like she's doing alright.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Well, that's good to hear.
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: Here we are.
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: The short Savra takes a look around the area.

The scars of war and the onslaughts the city has suffered are still clearly visible. The walls of the houses here, blown apart by cannon fire, have yet to be repaired. The damaged roads are still covered with fresh cement that has yet to dry.
Nonetheless, the morning streets are bustling, the slum dwellers are making their rounds, and the hawkers' peddling and the construction sounds nearby echo in unison.
The city is slowly recovering.
Do you speak Yan or Lungmenese?
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: I get by. Studied a bit.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Don't say anything weird after we get inside. Do as I say.
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: The people here aren't all that friendly to outsiders.
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: Secondly, don't go running around, and don't go taking any strolls in the back alleys.
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: There are still some roads being repaired, and some of the buildings are really badly damaged and haven't been demolished yet.
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: Yeah, Ah Sir, I get it. Don't worry.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Three bucks a bottle! Just three bucks! Ice cold soda! You ain't gonna find soda cheaper than this in Lungmen!
attributes.name: Soda Hawker

attributes.content: Yo, Ah Hoi, gimme a bottle!
attributes.name: Porter

attributes.content: You got it!
attributes.name: Soda Hawker

attributes.content: That's him.
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: Ah Hoi the soda guy. That's what everyone here calls him these days, at least.
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: Selling soda, huh? I didn't know he had a brain for business.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: I'll wait for you around the corner.
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: Here's a communicator. If things look like they're about the get hairy, call for help.
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: It costs an arm and a leg, so don't break it.
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: I've known him a long time... I won't need it.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Just take it. Better safe than sorry.
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: It's almost Sauin. Everyone at the department's got plenty to do.
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: You're not from here, and the Infected district's situation's complicated. You don't know what it's like.
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: If things go wrong, the cops around won't get to you in time.
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: I get it, I get it. I promise it'll be fine.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Well, be careful.
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: Soda! Three bucks a bottle...
attributes.name: Soda Hawker

attributes.content: Yo...
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: How's business?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Soda Hawker

attributes.content: Yep, it's me. Never thought I'd see you again.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Soda Hawker

attributes.content: So you actually came.
attributes.name: Soda Hawker

attributes.content: I knew this would happen one day. I just didn't expect it to happen so soon.
attributes.name: Soda Hawker

attributes.content: This isn't the reaction I was expecting...
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: It's been a while, Kevin.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: We haven't seen each other since you went to Chernobog. How long has it been, three years?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: I don't really know what happened to you since.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Looks like you're holding up pretty well, though.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: I'm getting by...
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: That's good.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Why don't you say something? It feels kinda awkward.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: We didn't use to be like this.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: I've got no last words to say.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Err, what?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: *Cough*.
attributes.name: Passerby Old Man

attributes.content: Am I interrupting?
attributes.name: Passerby Old Man

attributes.content: Oh, not at all... Good morning, Master Lin.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Heavens, I am parched. Give me a bottle of your soda.
attributes.name: Master Lin?

attributes.content: Here you go. Three dollars, please.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: I'm getting on in years. My legs aren't what they used to be. Would it be a problem if I took a seat here?
attributes.name: Master Lin?

attributes.content: Not at all. Please, go ahead.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: What? What's that for?
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Nothing, I've just never seen you like this.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: I remember when we used to go junk diving together. You'd pick a fight with those wandering bums every day.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: You never this friendly.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: So that's why you're laughing at me?
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Nah, I'm not really trying to make fun of you.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: You live in this hut?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: This is the Lungmen slums. Practically everyone here lives in one of these.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: It's much better than the old days when we lived on the streets. At least I have a roof over my head now.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: That's a good thing.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Being able to settle down is already pretty great for kids like us.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: So...
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Are you alone? Where are the others?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: What happened after that?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: You really want to know? Still care?
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: What happened to the others after that...?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: They're dead.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Are you surprised? All Infected die sooner or later. If we don't die fighting, we die in some quiet corner, alone.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: If you want to know the gory details, I can lay them on you. They all died in the most undignified way possible. There, happy?
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Is that all you wanted to say?
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: If you want to fight... let's not do it here.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Fight? Why would I fight you?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: The folks here live a difficult life. If you kill me here, the L.G.D. will shut the whole place down. It'd be a big pain for my neighbors.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Hold on...
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: I think we've got a misunderstanding.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: You aren't here to kill me?
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: No, hold on a second.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Why would I kill you? What are you talking about?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: You can drop the act. I understand.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: You left Reunion and went somewhere else.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Going by that trendy getup, it's gotta be a great place, eh?
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Most Infected don't get to live as good of a life as you do.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: But if you want to keep living that high life, you still have one last obstacle.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: That's people like us.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: I know who you are. I know you used to be Reunion.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Once I'm dead, you won't have anyone to rat you out anymore. No one will ever know you were cut from the same cloth as us lowlifes.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: (Silence)
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: I knew this day would come.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Or should I say I've known for three years this day would come, when you told me you were thinking about leaving Reunion?
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: It's not like we get to live all that long anyway. Everyone else's dead, and I don't think all this peace and quiet is going to last that much longer for me either.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: (Silence)
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: What's wrong? Lost your tongue?
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: A year ago...
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: A year ago... I heard there were a few Reunion folks still in Lungmen.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: I spent all my money this year just to ask around, just to find you guys.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: I held out hope that you were doing okay, that you made it through everything alive.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Looks like I shouldn't have.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Hold on, you really aren't here to kill me?
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: How could I be...?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: I don't know what you've been through these last few years, but I've always thought of you as a brother.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Back when we were starving in Kazimierz, you stole a few cans of food just for the rest of us, and you got beaten up so bad.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: When we were out in the wilderness, you fought off those bandits with Packy. That's how I'm still alive.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: I'm grateful for you guys. If it wasn't for you, I would've died out there a long time ago.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: That's why I came here to look for you.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: But I kinda regret it now.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: I shouldn't have come.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Well, how about this? You're alive. That's good enough for me. It's a load off my mind.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Take this.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: It's Oripathy medicine. Here's the instructions. Follow them.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Well, that's it, then. You take care.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Wait!
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Hold on!
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: It's my bad. I got it all wrong.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: I apologize. This is all my fault.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: I didn't mean it. I just thought that...
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: A lot has happened these past few years. I've gotten a lot more suspicious.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Ah Hoi, a bottle for me!
attributes.name: Passerby Customer

attributes.content: Right away! Three bucks, please!
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Kevin puts on a tattered Industrial Arts casting glove and takes out a few bottles of light yellow soda. He tightly squeezes the glass bottles with both his hands. Before long, the surface of the bottles has begun to frost up.
When did you learn to use Arts like this...?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Remember that group of soldiers from up north?
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: You mean... the Yetis?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: After you left, I was assigned to the Airborne unit with a few other guys.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: We worked with the Yetis for a very long time.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: They're the ones who taught me this. I don't have much talent for Arts. All I can do is chill a few bottles of soda.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: They were good people. FrostNova, too.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: But they're all dead.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: So what happened to the others...?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Packy died on our way to Lungmen. You know how serious his Oripathy was.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Waltz... The Lungmen squads killed him when he tried to shield the others.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: I'm alive only because I got lucky.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: My jetpack broke down midflight. I crash-landed right in the garbage collector.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: By the time I came to, the war was over already.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: You know the most pathetic part? It was the junkmen from the slums here who found me. They dug me up from the mounds of trash, and that's how I'm still here.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Ah Hoi! A soda, please!
attributes.name: Passerby Girl

attributes.content: You got it. Three bucks.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Kevin turns around yet again and takes out a few more bottles of soda.
Take a look at the people here.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: They're all normal folks. There are some Infected too.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: All of them have their own lives.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: But, back then, that thought never so much as crossed my mind.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: When I took up arms, I really thought I was fighting for all the Infected out there.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Looking back, I guess I was just some rioter who smashed and burned everything in my tracks.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: In the end, I'm not even sure what I was doing these last couple years.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: In hindsight, I guess you were the one who really tried to figure it all out.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: I don't actually want to figure anything out.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: I'm not as ambitious as you're making me out to be.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: As long as I don't go hungry and I get a place to call home, that's good enough for me.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: But charging into somebody's house, dragging them out, and then beating them up, hurting them...
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: I may be an Infected, but to do all that just to get by? No way, not me.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: I'm not one to talk about righteousness, but that just isn't right. I know it.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: And that's why I left Reunion.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Anyway, I really mean it. It's a good thing you're still alive.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: I'm gonna get going.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: You're leaving already?
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Yeah... I actually sneaked out of work.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: This stuff...
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: How much do they cost...?
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Don't worry about it.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: They don't actually sell them out on the market. Just take them yourself, and don't let anybody know.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Right...
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Hey, hold on...
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Here. Take a few of these sodas. I bottled them myself.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: This is probably gonna be the last time we get to see each other.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: You take care.
attributes.name: Kevin

attributes.content: Yeah... You too.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Back already? That was quick.
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: Yeah, I guess.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: I don't mind. You can talk to the Inspector more about it.
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: Well, hello, Officer Kam.
attributes.name: Master Lin

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Master Lin

attributes.content: Good morning... Mister Lin.
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: It must be tiring to be on duty so early.
attributes.name: Master Lin

attributes.content: Oh, you're the young man who visited Ah Hoi just now.
attributes.name: Master Lin

attributes.content: R-Right, that's me.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: I don't know what happened between you, but Ah Hoi's a good man. Try not to make things too hard for him.
attributes.name: Master Lin

attributes.content: Well, I'll let you return to your duties now. Please excuse me.
attributes.name: Master Lin

attributes.content: Have a good day, Mister Lin...
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: Who's that old man...?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. Let's go.
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: The short Savra glances around the area one last time.
The scars and destruction left behind by war are slowly beginning to heal.
As time goes on, these traces will become a part of Lungmen, as a part of its long history.
On its war-torn streets, the citizens of Lungmen keep toiling away, living one day to the next.
Done already?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Yep.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Don't worry. He has nothing to do with Reunion anymore.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: The Kevin of Reunion is gone. He's Ah Hoi the soda guy.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Well, one less thing for me to worry about.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Kam!
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Right here, Inspector Hoshiguma.
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: Close the file, and I'll leave the paperwork to you.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: So... what's our conclusion for this case...?
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: He's just a normal Infected. Nothing special about him.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Anything else to keep in the files?
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: No need. Let's not look for trouble.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Understood... I'll get right to it.
attributes.name: Officer Kam

attributes.content: As for you... Here, take this.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: What's is it...?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: It's our file on you.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: So the L.G.D. investigated me?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: I may not look it, but I'm an L.G.D.'s inspector. I've got to do my job.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: To protect Lungmen's hard-earned peace, I need to investigate everything, and Rhodes Island is no exception.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: But well, this right now is a private matter. It's got nothing to do with the L.G.D., and I'll pretend the report's contents never existed in the first place.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: He's Ah Hoi, a Lungmen citizen, and you're Ethan, a Rhodes Island operator.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Let's leave it at that.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Thanks... Madame Oni.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Oh, and stop calling me that. It's not like we ever rubbed elbows or something.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Oh, my bad. Thank you, Officer Hoshiguma.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Uh, sorry, Inspector.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Right, do you have a way to get back to Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Yeah, I'll head back with the branch office convoy next week.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Sounds good. Have a safe trip back, and tell the Doctor and Ch'en I said hello.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: No problem.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Two weeks later...
Hm...
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: (I'll put it here.)
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Huh? What's this? Soda?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: I didn't know the cafeteria had any today.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Oh, I brought it here with me. Help yourselves.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Well, don't mind if I do!
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Maybe you should mind a little, grabbing all the freebies the first opportunity you get.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. Just a gift from a friend.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Right, it's just soda...
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: ...from a friend of mine.
attributes.name: Ethan
